events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit and I no longer need it.
The customer's request has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the mention of wanting money back for the jacket.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's recent order due to size issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, I haven't worn it, and it’s still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the info. We will issue a full refund once we receive the jacket returned to our warehouse. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label. I appreciate your help with this refund.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund back to your original payment method. You should see it reflected within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
We are closing this case now as the refund was successfully processed and confirmed. Thank you for contacting us.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about your recent refund experience with us.
